name: eduActiv8: Language Arts
description:
eduActiv8: Language Arts is an app designed to promote and support literacy for early learners. It currently contains 26 activities and is available in 14 languages.

Activities include letter flashcards and tracing, matching words to images, and building words from supplied letters. Five difficulty levels are available.

The app is currently available in the following languages:

  • English (US)
  • English (UK)
  • Catalan
  • French
  • German
  • Greek
  • Italian
  • Lakota
  • Macedonian (Cyrillic)
  • Polish
  • Portuguese (PT)
  • Russian
  • Serbian
  • Spanish (ES)

The eduActiv8 project was started by Ireneusz Imiolek, who maintains the (much more complete!) desktop version of eduActiv8. The eduActiv8 name, logo, and mascot are (c) Ireneusz Imiolek and used with permission. eduActiv8 Mobile is free software, and the GPLv3 licensed source code is available on Github. Development and translation credits are available in the CREDITS file.
